text.en: If you want to hide something use the toilet! I should probably leave my stuff there before this guy will find out that this things was stolen from him.

text.ru: Military guarded this house when they planned to meet high ranking guest from Moscov. They left some grenades in a box under it in case of an emegency.
text.en: Militaries guarded this house from bandits when they planned to met high ranking guest from Moscov, they left some grenades in box under it in case of emegency.

text.ru: Maan, cooking is a good thing but don't you think that we can find a better place for making dinner.. I know... I will go troll those churkas from pindostan at the city. Take care of it, please...
text.en: Maan, cooking is a good thing but don't you think that we can find a better place for making dinner.. ik... i will go to troll this churkas from pindostan at the city. Take care of it, please...

text.ru: When the zone didn`t exist and the sun was bright.... who cares, some stalker newbie told me that he somehow got to this ship near a lake and left all he got during trip in there, he is too scared to come back for it.
text.en: When the zone doesn't exist and sun was bright.... who cares, some stalker newbie told me that he somehow got to this ship near lake and left all he got during trip in that place, he is too feared to come back here.

text.ru: Another day in this hard stalker life. I didn't plan to move through merc cordons, but since I am there, better stash my equipment or they definately will shoot me in head.
text.en: Another day from hard stalker life, i didn't plan to move through merc cordons, but since i am there, better to leave my equipment here or they definatly will shoot me in head.

text.ru: Who's idea was it, from central command, to move Blackwater here? Stupid bastards! I am sure they can't imagine how hard it is to bring freedom to these people, they hate us all! I will leave some stuff in this safe, just in case of a military attack.
text.en: Who's idea from central command was to move Blackwater here? stupid bastards, i am sure they can't imagine how hard is to bring freedom to peoples there, they hate us all! I will leave some stuff in this safe, just in case of military attack.

text.ru: This abandoned house is a good place to hide my stuff. Hope the commander will never find out about the stolen vodka.
text.en: This abandonned houses good place to hide my stuff. Hope commander will never find out about stolen vodka.

text.ru: Good view, warm fireplace, nice wardrobe, cool place for stolen loot.
text.en: Good view, warm fireplace, nice wardrobe for robbed loot.

text.ru: What are we doing here? Patroling this place is so boring... At least you can find old army boxes which can be use as personal storage.
text.en: What we are doing here.. patroling this place is so boring, at least you can find nice army box which can be use as personal storage.

text.ru: Some gifted monolith member thought that a shithole was a good place to stash his goods.
text.en: Some gifted monolith member think ground shit is a good place to hide his backpack, at least he didn't throw it in a hole.

text.ru: Not sure who's idea it was, this drunken bastard or my smoky ass, but when we got to the roof of that house we found an ideal place for all this crap we took from dead stalkers who met us. ha-ha.
text.en: Not sure who's idea was that... this drunken bastard or my smoky ass, but when we got to the roof of that house we found ideal place for all this crap we took from dead stalkers who met us. ha-ha.

text.ru: God bless the Monolith! God bless the.. MONEY! I am proud to be a part of this, hopefully these befuddled idiots won't figure out where I am hiding my treasures.
text.en: God bless the Monolith! god bless the.. MONEY! i am pround to be a part of this, but my own skin little more expensive, definatly this befuddled idiots won't figure out where i am hiding my treasures.

text.ru: Mother told me not to play with electricity, but why should I care if a holy stone protects me from everything? I will hide all my rewards I deserved for good team operations.
text.en: Mother told me not to play with electicity, but why should i care if holy stone protect me from everything? I will hide all my reward i derserved for good team operations.

text.ru: An argument about who would find the best hiding place ended badly, Never try to sneak near an angry controllers abode!
text.en: An argument who will better hide his goods ended badly, never try to sneak near angry controller living place!

text.ru: A luggage rack always was a good opportunity to hide something valuable for stalkers. This one planned to raid through pripyat.. though he was unlucky.
text.en: Luggage rack always was a good opportinity to hide something valuable for stalkers, this one planned to raid through pripyat.. though he was unlucky.

text.ru: I hate this road.. not sure why the commander`s interested in these rocks and caves, but it's definitely not the place I wanna be! At least I can hide some rpg stuff here, it`s a bitch to carry around.
text.en: I hate this road.. not sure why commanders interested in this rocks and caves, but it's definatly not the place i wana be! At least i can hide some rpg stuff their, hard to carry so big gun.

text.ru: My mate from the dark stalkers told me that he likes this wagon like his own gun, I hope he is not crazy, but definitely he hides something beneath.
text.en: My mate from dark stalkers told me that he likes this vagon like his own gun, i hope he is not crazy, but definatly he hides something beneath.

text.ru: Living in a cave is depressing.. it blurs your eyes, eats at your brains.. makes you feel less then human, with no chance to be normal again. At least you have all your loot near and safe.
text.en: Living in cave depressing.. it blures your eyes, eat your brains.. makes from you unhuman creature with no chance to be normal again, at least you have all loot near your back.

text.ru: This place became a home for survived mercenaries, why not hide some medkits and ammo under the table?
text.en: This place became a home for survived mercenaries, why not to hide some medkits and ammo under proper table?

text.ru: Stalkers always find a good place to hide their equipment, there`s one of them near radioactive anomaly.
text.en: Stalkers always find a good place to hide their equipments, it's one of them near radioactive anomaly.

text.ru: Do you like soviet cars? Probably not. That`s the same thought a stranger had who walked around there. If you lose your attitude, a nice gift will be the reward.
text.en: Do you like soviet cars? probably nope, same thought a stranger who walked around there, if you'll overcome your attitude a nice gift will be the reward.

text.ru: As a professional I am telling you, it's impossible to get there. My outfit is the best one ever found in zone, so pure bastards will just die if they try to reach this case... hehe.
text.en: As professional i am telling you it's impossible to get there that i am sure, my outfit the best one ever found in zone, so pure bastards will just die if they try to reach this case... hehe.

text.ru: We are scientists are we not? Right! So where`s the best place to hide our goods so no one will find out? Underground Lab? No, labrat! Thats too easy.
text.en: We are scientits right? Right, so where better place to hide our goods so no one will find out? Undeground Lab? No, labrat! Kitchen range, open your eyes.. Ah... okey, i got it.

text.ru: I am on duty tonight. We will meet at 6 pm, but who knows what is on this bastard mind? Better leave my valuables here.
text.en: I am going on duty this night, hope we will meet in time, he said 6 pm, but who knows what is on this bastard mind? better to leave valuables here.

text.ru: You know.. I've been thinking.. have you seen anybody around here? No, neither have I, so let's use this stove for a stash.
text.en: You know.. i've been thinking.. you see anybody around here? neither do i, so let's use this stove for non direct purpose.. and then move to find another looser with artefacts.

text.ru: Sorry brothers, I tried my best, but these horrible creatures almost caught me. All I found during this journey to hell I`ll will put in this rucksack. I hope I will be remembered...
text.en: Sorry brothers, i tried my best but this horrible creatures almost cought me up, all what i found during this hell trip i will put to this rucksack, i hope you will remember me sometimes..

text.ru: If you want some food, it's time to search the kitchen.
text.en: If you want to get some food it's time to search the kitchen.

text.ru: Dear robber, if you find this backpack, please return it or I WILL TRAP and FEED you to the bloodsuckers!!
text.en: Dear robber, if you will find this backpack, please return it back or I WILL TRAP and FOOD bloodsuckers with you!

text.ru: This lager was full of duty before the bloodsuckers came. They all ran away and left a box with weapons.
text.en: This lager was full of duty before bloodsuckers came, when they run away quickly from dangerous area somebody left box with weapons.

text.ru: Parkour always was my hobby, Dimon. At least nobody will steal what belongs to me, I am sure.
text.en: Parkour always was my hobby, Dimon. At least nobody will steal what belongs to me, i am sure.

text.ru: Swamp doctor prefer the old fashion way and keep his items in front of his eyes, as his mate you can take what you need.
text.en: Swamp doctor prefer old fashion way and keep his items in front of his eyes, as his mate you can take what you need.

text.ru: These helicopters blow my mind! How we can leave here if they all want to see us dead?! At least I am not sure the military is brave enough to fight face to face, so I will hide my special items here.
text.en: This helicopters blow up my mind! How we can leave there if they all want to see us dead?! At least i am not sure military brave enough to fight face to face, so will hide my specials here.

text.ru: Somethings not right with this barrel bro... ah of course.. I wanted to put the head of my former employer here. Okay, let's use it for a different purpose.
text.en: Something not right with this barrel bro... ah of course.. i wanted to put there head of my former employer. Okey, let's use it little otherwise.

text.ru: How do you trick a greedy bandit? Find an open space where he can get stuck in a bog and be killed by scary ghosts and then place your goods there!
text.en: How to trick a greedy bandit? Find an open space where he can be killed by scary ghost and die in quag then place your goods there!

text.ru: This bridge was full of stalkers in the past. Somebody decided to put his loot there with the hopes of returning to it one day.
text.en: This bridge was a full of stalkers in past, somebody decided to put his loot there with hope to return after them later.

text.ru: Military campers had lots of medkits and equipment in an emergency case, but then they were ordered by central command to move away..
text.en: Military campers had lots of medkit equipment in case of injuries, but then they were ordered by central command to move away..

text.ru: I will try to figure out where this pipe goes, let's hope not from Russia to Ukraine, you know.. stolen gas, hehe.
text.en: I will try to figure out where this pipe goes let's hope not from russia to ukraine, you know.. stolen gas, hehe.

text.ru: In case of trauma or bleeding, break this box.
text.en: In case of traumas and bleeding, try to break this box.

text.ru: What's in the bar, should stay in the bar.. at least it's heavily protected by freedom guards.
text.en: How peoples saying.. what's token in the bar, should left in it.. at least it's heavily protected by freedom guards.

text.ru: Ivancov is quite an astute person, he always keeps his tools and equipment in a proper place.
text.en: Ivancov quite accurate person, he always keep his tooling and equipment in proper place.

text.ru: The was a rumor that some monolith group settled near the dam, of course they took some items to get rid of outskirts guests...
text.en: The was a rumor, that some monolith group settled near the dumb, of course they took some items to get rid of outskirts guests...

text.ru: This outskirts garbage is full of radioactive stuff, let's hide more valuable stuff here and return to freedom camp.
text.en: This outskirts garbage full of radioactive stuff, let's hide more valuable stuff here and return to freedom camp.

text.ru: Trash is always trash, some stalkers put their useless things which they couldn't carry anymore.
text.en: Trash is always trash, some stalkers put there useless things which they couldn't carry anymore.

text.ru: Under the memorial star is written: "Sergey Geranovich. 1978-2012. Fought with honor and died in combat. Awarded the highest honour from his country - USSR.
text.en: Under the memorial star written: "Sergey Grigorievich. 1978-2012. Fighted with honor and died from THQ hands. Got 3 bullets in head and the highest award from party and his country - USSR.

text.ru: Nah, better not hide things in wooden church again, anyone can get in there at night and take it. Let's be more smart this time..
text.en: Nah, better not to hide things again in wooden church, anyone can get there at night and im totaly drugged, let's be more smart this time..

text.ru: Even scientists need a place to keep their personal stuff untouched, though they always have messy tables.
text.en: Even scientists need a place to keep their personal stuff untouched, though they always has a mess on tables.

text.ru: Eco dummmies, they always want to touch things which they shouldn't and use them in their experiments! Better hide my goods properly.
text.en: Eco dumbs, they always want to touch things which they don't belong and use in their experiments! Better hide my goods propetly.

text.ru: These zombies creatures are everywhere! How stupid could I be to visit this area in first place.. at least this substation is a safe area to rest until help arrives.. or is it?
text.en: This zombies creature are everywhere! How stupid i could be to visit this area in first place.. at least this substation safe area to rest until help will come.. will it?

text.ru: The whole situation is just horrible. I planned to do my reseach of these braindead humans in this area, but it all went wrong and now I have fatal injuries with no chance of escape. At least I can leave this journal of my lifetimes work here in the hopes that somebody will find it.
text.en: The whole situation is just horrible, i planned to do my reseach of this braindead humans at this area. But all went wrong, now i am dying here with deadly injuries with no chance to escape, at least i will leave this jornal and my lifetime work here in hope that somebody will find it.

text.ru: Brainnnnsssss... really? I am too old for such things, better leave young snorks to deal with humans and I will try grab something for myself...
text.en: Brainnnnsssss... really? i am too old for such things, better leave young growth snorks to deal with humans and i will try to grab something for myself...

text.ru: Some stalker left his equipment near the garages, probably he will never return alive to retrieve it.
text.en: Some stalker left his equipment near garages, probably he will never returned alive to take his stuff.

text.ru: It's awful, I'm stuck here with my mate waiting for these terrible creatures to go away, but they are just.. staying.. day.. night.. I don't know what to do, we plan to breakthrough this factory, I will leave this backpack if we ever need to return.
text.en: It's awfull, i stucked there with my mate in hope of this terrible creatures will go away, but they are just.. staying.. day.. night.. i don't know what to do, we plan breakthrough from this factory, i will leave this backpack if we will need to return back.

text.ru: Fall asleep my little babe... bears, monsters go away... close your eyes and close your ears... I don't want to see your tears...
text.en: Fall to sleep my little babe... bears, monsters go away... close your eyes and close your ears... i don't want to see your tears...

text.ru: Underground bunkers are the best places to hide anything you want. Same thought one curious merc had before a snork ate him.
text.en: Undeground bunker the best place to hide any stuff you want, same way thought one curious merc before snork ate him.

text.ru: Eulogy etched on the grave: "For my best mate, who supported me through my whole life and died from radiation poisoning. Rest in peace...".
text.en: An eulogy is etched on the grave: "For my best mate, who supported me whole life and died from radiation poisoning. Rest in peace...".

text.ru: Scavengers, they always look around the factory for hidden stashes.. But they never planed to search in the hollow of a wooden branch. I need to be careful this time..
text.en: Scavangers, they always look around factory for hidden stashes.. But they never planed to search in hollow of a wooden branch. I need to be carefull this time..

text.ru: It's a good place to hide something small and valuable, though the hole grid around you makes you think twice..
text.en: It's a good place to hide something small and valuable, though hole grid around make you think twice..

text.ru: I always liked excavators when was a kid... you too buddy? Let's use this place for our belongings, I will go visit this young scientists at the bunker to get protection and we can move.
text.en: I always liked excavators when was a kid... you too buddy? let's use this place for our belongings, i will go to visit this young scientists at the bunker to get protection and we can move.

text.ru: Old soviet bus with equipment box inside it. Bandits sometime try to find anything usefull here, but fail every time.
text.en: Old soviet bus with equipment box inside it, bandits sometimes try to find anything usefull there, but fails every time.

text.ru: It's not a joke, a crazy smuggler climbed to this elevator and put his stuff near the rusty engine, but who cares if you could get there easily?
text.en: It's not a joke this crazy smuggler climbed to this elevator and put his stuff near the rusty engine. But who cares if you could get there easily?

text.ru: Some former mercenaries prefer shooting unlucky stalkers from a distance. This one decided to leave his past with his backpack full of equipment.
text.en: Some former mercenaries prefer shooting from unlucky stalkers from a distance. This one decided to leave his past with his backpack equipment.

text.ru: "So lots of electricity failures these days... we can't live like this in our own base. Here is one place you should check.."
text.en: "So lots of electicity failures these days... we can't live like this in our own base. Here is one place you should check.."

text.ru: That military guy was too drunk and couldn't see what I did to him. Heh, let's keep it here for now in the village.
text.en: That military guy was too drunk and couldn't see what i did to him. Heh, let's keep it here for now in the village.

text.ru: Some stranger decided to keep his stuff under the protection of bricks in a former prison. It was good idea at first, but he didn't know about you!
text.en: Some stranger decided to keep his stuff under the protection of bricks in a former prison, it was good idea at first, but he didn't know about you!

text.ru: Let's keep it here, we can return after the blowout. You saw those creatures nearby, I don't think anybody will risk following us to these blocks.
text.en: Let's keep it here, we can return after blowout. You saw those creatures nearby, I don't think anybody will risk following us to these blocks.

text.ru: Emergency supplies in case of blowout. Do not use!
text.en: Emergency supplies incase of blowout. Do not use!

text.ru: A generic term applied broadly to any of various small, soft-boned, saltwater fish such as Sprats and young Pilchards and Herrings. These tiny fish are iridescent and silvery and swim in huge pools, usually near the water's surface. Fresh sardines are available on a limited basis during the summer months, usually only along the coast where they're caught. In general, their fatty flesh is best when grilled, broiled or fried. In the United States, sardines are more commonly found salted, smoked or canned, either in oil, tomato sauce or mustard sauce. Some are packed as is, while others are skinned, boned and sold as fillets. The name is thought to have come from the young pilchards caught off the coast of Sardinia, which were one of the first fish packed in oil.
text.en: A generic term applied broadly to any of various small, soft-boned, salt-water fish such as Sprats and young Pilchards and Herrings. These tiny fish are iridescent and silvery and swim in huge pools, usually near the water's surface. Fresh sardines are available on a limited basis during the summer months, usually only along the coast where they're caught. In general, their fatty flesh is best when grilled, broiled or fried. In the United States, sardines are more commonly found salted, smoked or canned, either in oil, tomato sauce or mustard sauce. Some are packed as is, while others are skinned, boned and sold as fillets. The name is thought to have come from the young pilchards caught off the coast of Sardinia, which were one of the first fish packed in oil.

text.ru: Обычный спальный мешок. Он не заменит теплую постель и объятия матери, но по крайней мере он непроницаем.
text.en: Ordinary sleeping bag. It won't replace a warm bed and a mother's cuddle, but at least it's impermeable.

text.ru: Штатная рация военных, также используется сталкерами, чтобы общаться со своими друзьями.
text.en: Regular military hand radio, a transmitter/receiver device used by Stalkers to communicate with their friends

text.ru: Используйте этот модуль, чтобы ваш КПК мог читать всю загруженную информацию с компьютеров, он поддерживает Wi-Fi и удаленный доступ через ОС на базе Линукс.
text.en: This module allows you to store all downloaded information from computers, supports wi-fi and remote access via systems based on Linux.

text.ru: Обычные щелочные батарейки. Именно то, что вам нужно, когда фонарик не светит.
text.en: Ordinary alkaline batteries. Exactly what you need when your flashlight is not shining.

text.ru: Водка используется Loxotron'ом, чтобы заглушить свои чувства. Крайне опасна, имеет равное по объему кол-во спирта и аммиака.
text.en: Vodka used by Loxotron to deaden his senses. Highly dangerous, has equal parts alcohol and ammonia.

text.ru: Отвертки, клещи, отвертки, точильный камень... все, что нужно в маленькой и компактной мастерской.
text.en: Screwdrivers, pincers, screws, grindstone... all you need in a small and compact repair kit.

text.ru: Подробная карта Мёртвого города, содержащая схему расположения позиций наёмников
text.en: A detailed map of the Dead City including Merc's positions

text.ru: Ключ Доктора от тайника в Припяти
text.en: Doctor's key to a secret stash in Pripyat

text.ru: Защитный костюм. Вес - 18 кг. Особенности: защищает тело от "студня", "жгучего пуха", большинства аномалий и механических повреждений. Грудная клетка и спина защищены встроенными биометаллическими пластинами. Оборудован герметичным металлопластиковым шлемом и двумя кислородными баллонами. Внимание: при продолжительном использовании приходит в негодность - повреждается и рвётся.
text.en: Protective suit. Weight: 18kg. Details: Protects the body from Jelly, Burnt Fuzz, most anomalies and physical damage. The torso and back are protected by built-in bio-metallic plates. The suit is equipped with an airtight, reinforced plastic helmet and two oxygen bottles. Note: During extended periods of use the suit tears through and gradually deteriorates beyond use.

text.ru: Защитный костюм. Вес - 8 кг. Особенности: защищает тело от воздействия слабых аномалий и механических повреждений. Оборудован кислородной маской. Внимание: при продолжительном использовании приходит в негодность - повреждается и рвётся.
text.en: Protective suit. Weight: 8 kg. Details: Protects the body from weak anomalies and physical damage. Equipped with an oxygen mask. Note: During extended periods of use the suit tears through and gradually deteriorates beyond use.

text.ru: Защитный костюм. Вес - 12 кг. Особенности: защищает тело от "студня", "жгучего пуха", многих аномалий и механических повреждений. Оборудован герметичным шлемом и кислородным баллоном. Внимание: при продолжительном использовании приходит в негодность - повреждается и рвётся.
text.en: Protective suit. Weight: 12 kg. Details: Protects the user from Jelly, Burnt Fuzz, many anomalies and physical damage. Equipped with an airtight helmet and an oxygen bottle. Note: During extended periods of use the suit tears through and gradually deteriorates beyond use.

text.ru: Защитный скафандр красного цвета с герметичным шлемом. Вес - 11 кг. Особенности: защищает тело от огня, кислот, газов, воздействия разнообразных аномалий, "жгучего пуха" и механических повреждений. Оборудован двумя кислородными баллонами. Внимание: при продолжительном использовании приходит в негодность - повреждается и рвётся.
text.en: A red S.C.A.P.E suit with an airtight helmet. Weight: 11kg. Description: Protects the body from fire, acid, toxic gas, various anomalies, Burnt Fuzz and physical damage. Equipped with two oxygen bottles. Note: During extended periods of use the suit tears through and gradually deteriorates beyond use.

text.ru: Устройство, определяющее наличие аномальных полей и возмущений и сообщающее о них звуковым сигналом. Для работы необходимо активировать, разместив прибор на поясе.
text.en: A device for detecting anomaly fields and disturbances. Notifies of their presence with a sound. Needs to be attached to the belt and turned on to operate correctly.

text.ru: Карманный персональный компьютер - незаменимое устройство в Зоне.
text.en: Personal Digital Assistant - Indispensable in the Zone.

text.ru: В этом КПК упоминается клиент, который послал экспедицию в эту лабораторию, и его контактные данные GPS зашифрованны в мобильном, довольно не легко отследить, кто имеет этот номер.
text.en: In this pda mentioned a customer, who ordered expedition to this lab and his contact details through gps encrypted mobile, but it's quite hard to trace who has this number.

text.ru: Фонарик с довольно мощной лампой. Весьма полезная вещь в условиях недостаточной освещённости.
text.en: A powerful flashlight. Quite useful in areas with insufficient lighting.

text.ru: Фонарик с довольно мощной лампой. Благодаря усовершенствованному трансформатору уменьшено время зарядки аккумулятора.
text.en: A powerful flashlight. Battery recharge time has been reduced thanks to a modernized transformer.

text.ru: Отличный энергетический напиток "Non stop". Содержит кофеин, таурин и мощный витаминный комплекс, снимающие усталость и прибавляющие сил. Не в состоянии сделать даже шаг? Тогда это именно то, что нужно.
text.en: This is an excellent energy drink consisting of caffeine, taurine and a mixture of rejuvenating vitamins. Just the ticket when you're too tired to push forward!

text.ru: Неизвестно, кто умудряется печь батоны на территории Зоны, однако этот хлеб не заражен и вполне съедобен. Во всяком случае, никто из сталкеров пока не жаловался.
text.en: Hard to say who manages to bake these loaves in the Zone, but the bread isn't contaminated and is perfectly edible. Well, at least none of the Stalkers have complained about it.

text.ru: Консервы с растащенного сталкерами армейского продовольственного склада. Срок годности вроде бы не истёк.
text.en: Canned food from an army warehouse raided by Stalkers. The best-before period hasn't expired yet.

text.ru: Часто за неимением лучшего эта колбаса - смесь курятины и соевого заменителя - завтрак, обед и ужин сталкера.
text.en: Made from a mix of chicken and soya, the "diet" sausage is often, for lack of other options, a Stalker's breakfast, lunch and dinner in one.

text.ru: Водка производства компании "GSC". Хорошо пьётся, заметно снижает воздействие радиации, однако злоупотреблять ей не следует.
text.en: Vodka made by the GSC company. Goes down easily and significantly reduces the effects of radiation, but for obvious reasons should be enjoyed in moderation.

text.ru: Универсальный медицинский набор. Позволяет справляться с травмами различного вида и степени сложности - ранениями, ожогами, отравлениями и прочим.
text.en: An all-purpose medkit. Used to treat injuries of various types and severities - wounds, burns, poisonings, etc.

text.ru: Специализированный медицинский набор для борьбы с физическими повреждениями и кровотечением. В него входят компоненты для ускорения свертывания крови, обезбаливающие, антибиотики и имунные стимуляторы.
text.en: A specialized medical set to fight against physical damage and blood loss. In it is included a component for blood coagulation, antibiotics, immunal stimulators, and painkillers.

text.ru: Медицинский набор, разработанный специально для работы в условиях Зоны. Состав набора подобран как для борьбы с ранениямы, так и для вывода радионуклидов из организма. Препятствует развитию лучевой болезни а также снижает дозу накопленной радиации.
text.en: Medical set, designed especially for work in the Zone. The set includes means of healing wounds as well as means of eliminating radionucleodes from the body. Prevents the development of radiowave sickness and lowers the dose of accumulated radiation.

text.ru: Предназначен для обнаружения аномальных зон, а также очагов радиоактивного загрязнения.
text.en: Intended for the detection of anomalous zones as well as hotbeds of radioactive pollution.

text.ru: Феромоны мутанта : говорят, можно успокоить некоторых видов мутантов на короткое время, после того, как их облить этим.
text.en: Mutant pheromones : said to calm various species for short periods of time when doused over ones body.
A voice recorder disguised as a useless thermometer.

text.ru: \nThe only bird species to have survived in the Zone, enduring increased radiation levels and effectively avoiding anomalies. While the army pilots need to rely on complex detectors to avoid gravitational disturbances, the crow seems to rely on its own senses for that - a mystery that drives ornithologists and biologists mad. Various theories attempting to explain the phenomenon exist, all of them pointing to a highly specialized development of the bird's brain.
text.en: The only bird species to have survived in the Zone, enduring increased radiation levels and effectively avoiding anomalies. While the army pilots need to rely on complex detectors to avoid gravitational disturbances, the crow seems to rely on its own senses for that - a mystery that drives ornithologists and biologists mad. Various theories attempting to explain the phenomenon exist, all of them pointing to a highly specialized development of the bird's brain.

text.ru: \nSeveral generations of the dog species have lived and died since the catastrophe. Each was more affected by the Zone than the previous one. Rapid mutation lead to a vast improvement in previously peripheral abilities, frequently at the expense of primary ones. The most notable biological change was the loss of sight, paired with an uncanny development of smell. As it turned out, blind cubs survived in the Zone as well as normal ones, if not better. As a result, the common dog quickly became extinct in the Zone, giving way to a new breed - that of blind dogs. Like their wild ancestors - the wolves - blind dogs hunt in packs. An encounter with a large group of these animals can be dangerous even to an experiences and well-armed stalker.
text.en: Several generations of the dog species have lived and died since the catastrophe. Each was more affected by the Zone than the previous one. Rapid mutation lead to a vast improvement in previously peripheral abilities, frequently at the expense of primary ones. The most notable biological change was the loss of sight, paired with an uncanny development of smell. As it turned out, blind cubs survived in the Zone as well as normal ones, if not better. As a result, the common dog quickly became extinct in the Zone, giving way to a new breed - that of blind dogs. The animals instinctively identify and avoid anomalies, radiation, and other invisible dangers that plague the Zone. Like their wild ancestors - the wolves - blind dogs hunt in packs. An encounter with a large group of these animals can be dangerous even to an experiences and well-armed stalker.

text.ru: \nDespite the name, the pseudodogs evolved directly from wolves. The animals inhabiting the forests at the time of the catastrophe gave rise to one of the Zone's most dangerous mutant species. Pseudodogs are about as different from mutant dogs as wild wolves differ from poodles. The creatures mark and guard their territory carefully, attacking anyone stupid enough to venture onto their land on sight. Lightning-fast reflexes, uncanny dexterity and razor-sharp teeth make the pseudodog a formidable enemy for large mutants and well-armed stalkers.
text.en: Despite the name, the Pseudodogs evolved directly from wolves. The animals inhabiting the forests at the time of the catastrophe gave rise to one of the Zone's most dangerous mutant species. Pseudodogs are about as different from mutant dogs as wild wolves differ from poodles. The creatures mark and guard their territory carefully, attacking anyone stupid enough to venture onto their land on sight. Lightning-fast reflexes, uncanny dexterity and razor-sharp teeth make the pseudodog a formidable enemy for large mutants and well-armed stalkers.

text.ru: The resistance of mutant dogs' skin to electricity and chemical agents has long been the subject of scientific attention. Since the animal's tail is almost completely free of fat tissue, it is especially suited for lab examination.
text.en: The resistance of mutant dogs' skin to electricity and chemical agents has long been the subject of scientific attention. Since the animal's tail is almost completely free of fat tissue and this particular breed in particular is especially suited for lab examination.

text.ru: \nLike most other living creatures in the Zone, the domestic pig also underwent serious biological changes since the day of the catastrophe. It seems the genes responsible for metabolism were especially affected in this case. Mutant pigs, known simply as Flesh among the stalkers, are one of the most vivid examples of the Zone's disastrous perversion of nature. Mutant pigs developed a protective layer of scales and exoskeletal plates. Their regeneration potential increased several times, as did the complexity of their nervous system. Just like a normal pig, a Flesh is an omnivore and may attack a stalker if hungry.
text.en: Like most other living creatures in the Zone, the domestic pig also underwent serious biological changes since the day of the catastrophe. It seems the genes responsible for metabolism were especially affected in this case. Mutant pigs, known simply as Flesh among the stalkers, are one of the most vivid examples of the Zone's disastrous perversion of nature. Mutant pigs developed a protective layer of scales and exoskeletal plates. Their regeneration potential increased several times, as did the complexity of their nervous system. Just like a normal pig, a Flesh is an omnivore and may attack a stalker if hungry.

text.ru: The mutated, swollen eye of the Flesh acquired a number of strange characteristics, the most useful of which is the ability to regenerate the lens. The specifics of the process are hitherto unknown, although such discovery would most certainly revolutionize modern medicine. You can play your part in scientific development by selling Flesh eyes to scientists for their experiments.
text.en: The mutated, swollen eye of the Flesh acquired a number of strange characteristics, the most useful of which is the ability to regenerate the lens. The specifics of the process are unknown, although such discovery would most certainly revolutionize modern medicine. You can play your part in scientific development by selling Flesh eyes to scientists for their experiments.

text.ru: \nA massive, mutated animal, reaching 1.5 meters at the shoulder. The Zone boar's aggressiveness and ability to survive surpass by far those of its relatives outside the contaminated area. Radiation and anomalies left their mark on the physical appearance of the animal as well: its fur is entirely gone in some places, and long and bristly in others. The hooves have evolved into sturdy, sharp claws, the pupils became colorless, and the boar's bald head is marred by pigmentation disorders and deep wrinkles. Zone boars are quite resistant to radiation and can stay in heavily contaminated areas for longer periods of time. They usually charge at their victims, trying to knock them over and then rip them to shreds.
text.en: A massive, mutated animal, reaching 1.5 meters at the shoulder. The Zone boar's aggressiveness and ability to survive surpass by far those of its relatives outside the contaminated area. Radiation and anomalies left their mark on the physical appearance of the animal as well: its fur is entirely gone in some places, and long and bristly in others. The hooves have evolved into sturdy, sharp claws, the pupils became colorless, and the boar's bald head is marred by pigmentation disorders and deep wrinkles. Zone boars are quite resistant to radiation and can stay in heavily contaminated areas for longer periods of time. They usually charge at their victims, trying to knock them over and then rip them to shreds.

text.ru: \nCats that have succumbed to the Zone’s influence. Over the years, they have developed abilities that are very dangerous for Stalkers, namely their speed, added size, strength, and large claws. They are very aggressive and are mostly solitary. Cases of them living in small groups have also been recorded. They are somewhat aggressive.
text.en: Cats that have succumbed to the Zone’s influence. Over the years, they have developed abilities that are very dangerous for Stalkers, namely their speed, added size, strength, and large claws. They are very aggressive and are mostly solitary. Cases of them living in small groups have also been recorded. They are somewhat aggressive.

text.ru: If you kill a cat, you may remove its head, and then sell it as trophy to the traders. They will sell it to bike companies, you know cat-eye ...
text.en: If you kill a cat, you may remove its head, and then sell it as trophy to the traders. It makes for a fine display in mansions...

text.ru: \nIn fact these animals are not related to jerboas, although there is a distinct resemblance. Attempts at determining the exact species from which this rodent evolved have so far been unsuccessful, although its ancestor must have been a gregarious rodent. Reaching up to 40cm at the shoulder, the animal is far more dexterous, aggressive and ravenous than its desert cousin. Mutant rodents live mainly in basements of destroyed buildings and swamps, feeding on everything they can get their teeth in, from plants to careless stalkers. Occasionally a pack of rodents will attack and kill large animals and mutants, tearing them apart before they can escape.
text.en: In fact these animals are not related to jerboas, although there is a distinct resemblance. Attempts at determining the exact species from which this Ratwolf evolved have so far been unsuccessful, although its ancestor must have been a gregarious rat. Reaching up to 40cm at the shoulder, the animal is far more dexterous, aggressive and ravenous than its cousin, the rats. Mutant ratwolves live mainly in basements of destroyed buildings, feeding on everything they can get their teeth in, from plants to careless stalkers. Occasionally a pack of ratwolves will attack and kill large animals and mutants, tearing them apart before they can escape.

text.ru: \nExperienced stalkers describe this semi-legendary beast as a tall, hunched humanoid with a mess of tentacles where its mouth should be. According to those who saw it and lived to tell the tale, the creature uses its tentacles to cling to the victim's throat, paralyze it, and suck it dry of blood. A dry, mummified shell is all that's left of what used to be a living human being. The most astounding feature of the bloodsucker, however, is its ability to become invisible. Countless dead or missing stalkers are said to have perished in the merciless grip of a bloodsucker. The lucky few who have survived an encounter tell spine-chilling tales of marshes and subterranean areas haunted by the Zone's version of Count Dracula.
text.en: Experienced stalkers describe this semi-legendary beast as a tall, hunched humanoid with a mess of tentacles where its mouth should be. According to those who saw it and lived to tell the tale, the creature uses its tentacles to cling to the victim's throat, paralyze it, and suck it dry of blood. A dry, mummified shell is all that's left of what used to be a living human being. The most astounding feature of the Bloodsucker, however, is its ability to become invisible. Countless dead or missing stalkers are said to have perished in the merciless grip of a Bloodsucker. The lucky few who have survived an encounter tell spine-chilling tales of marshes and subterranean areas haunted by the Zone's version of Count Dracula.

text.ru: \n1.4m in length. The result of genetic experimentation in the UHSF H.O.R.O.R. program. Extremely cunning, strong and fast creature; it hides, flanks, and circles around to attack its prey from behind. It has a doubled system of internal organs and an additional brain, both which make this creature problematic to kill, at the very least. It can also heal itself by regeneration of lost cells. It has almost no natural (for the Zone) predators. Its movement and agility is reminiscent of a panther. The only worthy opponents for this creature are the Bloodsucker and the Pseudogiant.
text.en: 1.4m in length. The result of genetic experimentation. Extremely cunning, strong and fast creature; it hides, flanks, and circles around to attack its prey from behind. It has a doubled system of internal organs and an additional brain, both which make this creature problematic to kill, at the very least. It can also heal itself by regeneration of lost cells. It has almost no natural predators in the Zone and is considered the Zone's greatest hunter. Its movement and agility is reminiscent of a panther. The only worthy opponents for this creature are the Bloodsucker and the Pseudogiant.

text.ru: \nThe pseudogiant resembles a massive, drop-shaped abdomen with a pair of disproportionately large limbs. The limbs are arms and legs at the same time. The creature uses them to move around and grab its victims. An adult pseudogiant can weigh up to two tons and stand 2 meters tall. Their clumsy appearance might be deceiving, since they can move very rapidly if needed. Their muscles are exceptionally powerful and their bones are as hard as steel. The creature's brain is protected by a sturdy (up to 10 centimeters thick) skull, while many complex functions are controlled by the spinal medulla. Another astonishing feature of the beast is its ability to create local shock waves, which damage all living things in the vicinity.
text.en: The Pseudogiant resembles a massive, drop-shaped abdomen with a pair of disproportionately large limbs. The limbs are arms and legs at the same time. The creature uses them to move around and grab its victims. An adult Pseudogiant can weigh up to two tons and stand 2 meters tall. Their clumsy appearance might be deceiving, since they can move very rapidly if needed. Their muscles are exceptionally powerful and their bones are as hard as steel. The creature's brain is protected by a sturdy (up to 10 centimeters thick) skull, while many complex functions are controlled by the spinal medulla. Another astonishing feature of the beast is its ability to create local shock waves, which damage all living things in the vicinity.

text.ru: \nSupernatural in the eyes of some, invisible creatures haunting the deeper reaches of the Zone, usually haunting old, abandoned buildings. Nothing is known about their origin, although rumors in circulation claim they are spirits of stalkers hit by a massive wave of radiation. Their mysterious appearances and disappearances seem to correspond to the poltergeist legend, hence the name. Known encounters with poltergeists are quite diverse in fact: from mischievous laughter and blood-chilling howling, to deadly fireballs appearing out of nowhere. Unfortunately, all information about the poltergeist phenomenon originates from unclear and contradictory stories of questionable validity.
text.en: Supernatural in the eyes of some, invisible creatures haunting the deeper reaches of the Zone, usually haunting old, abandoned buildings. Nothing is known about their origin, although rumors in circulation claim they are spirits of stalkers hit by a massive wave of radiation. Their mysterious appearances and disappearances seem to correspond to the Poltergeist legend, hence the name. Known encounters with Poltergeists are quite diverse in fact: from mischievous laughter and blood-chilling howling, to deadly fireballs appearing out of nowhere. Unfortunately, all information about the Poltergeist phenomenon originates from unclear and contradictory stories of questionable validity.

text.ru: Brain of a poltergeist. Very valuable stuff in the zone. It will proove that you really killed one, and also scientists will pay you a lot for it, since they are experimenting with unnatural monster bodies. They want to find out where their abilities come from.
text.en: Brain of a Poltergeist. Very valuable stuff in the zone. It will prove that you really killed one, and also scientists will pay you a lot for it, since they are experimenting with unnatural monster bodies. They want to find out where their abilities come from.

text.ru: \nIt seems these creatures were human at some point, though it is difficult to imagine what conditions could turn a human being into such disgusting beast. Snorks are insane creatures leading a beast's life and differing little from other carnivorous monsters in the Zone. They move on all fours in long jumps, constantly sniffing the ground in hope of picking up the scent of prey. They hunt carefully, in a calculated manner, frequently setting up ambushes. Thanks to its uncanny reflexes and powerful muscles, the snork can approach the victim, pin it down in one long, accurate jump, and tear it to shreds in a matter of seconds. Strips of army uniforms and other clothing are occasionally found on their bodies. It stands to reason that they are all that's left of missing military stalkers.
text.en: It seems these creatures were human at some point, though it is difficult to imagine what conditions could turn a human being into such disgusting beast. Snorks are insane creatures leading a beast's life and differing little from other carnivorous monsters in the Zone. They move on all fours in long jumps, constantly sniffing the ground in hope of picking up the scent of prey. They hunt carefully, in a calculated manner, frequently setting up ambushes. Thanks to its uncanny reflexes and powerful muscles, the snork can approach the victim, pin it down in one long, accurate jump, and tear it to shreds in a matter of seconds. Strips of army uniforms and other clothing are occasionally found on their bodies. It stands to reason that they are all that's left of missing military stalkers.

text.ru: \nA rare mutant seen near to the center of the Zone. Bears a superficial resemblance of a humanoid with a disproportionately big head. Possesses a good perception, and an ability to control the behavior of less developed creatures. Mature specimen are capable of taking control over human's head. This is a ferocious enemy, and even the most experienced stalkers are afraid of meeting it.
text.en: A human mutated by severe exposure to psy-emissions, usually seen near to the center of the Zone. Possesses good perception and the ability to control the behavior of less developed creatures with its altered neocortex. Mature specimens are capable of assuming direct control of several human brains at a time. This is a ferocious enemy, and even the most experienced stalkers are afraid of encountering it.

text.ru: It's the leg of the controller. This beast has strong heels, and traders can make strong knife baldes from them. Valuable item in the Zone, since it's cheap and perfect solution for a hunting knife.
text.en: It's the foot of the Controller. This beast has strong heels, and traders can craft strong knife blades from them. Valuable item in the Zone, since it's cheap and the perfect solution for a hunting knife. They are also exported to a few collectors who pay ridiculous sums of cash for such knives.

text.ru: \nUgly, pale-yellow dwarves. They usually inhabit underground ruins. Their sensitive eyes can go blind instantly from bright illumination. Underground, they set traps for Stalkers and scientists. They try to block all exits using large pieces of trash, debris, or furniture. These dwarves have powerful arms that they use to rip apart their prey. Burers wage war with blind-dogs. Their personalities are very unstable; nervousness, fear, and sudden outbursts of aggression force them to behave unpredictably and erratically. They have a developed sixth-sense and ability to use telekinesis. Their sixth sense allows them to see a possible threat without direct visual contact and establish its position. Telekinesis allows it to manipulate large objects at a distance, hurl them at an enemy, and use pyrokinesis to emit blasts of intense heat at opponents when no objects can be thrown. Their abilities, personalities, and intellect make them one of the most dangerous creatures in the Zone. A Stalker could be moving up a dark underground corridor, climbing through a jungle of trash and different pieces of industrial debris.
text.en: Ugly, red-skinned dwarves born from genetic experiments. They usually inhabit dark underground tunnels as their sensitive eyes can go blind instantly from the sun's bright illumination. In their underground lairs, they set traps for stalkers and scientists. They try to block all exits using large pieces of trash, debris, or furniture. Burers have powerful arms that they use to rip apart their prey. Their personalities are very unstable; nervousness, fear, and sudden outbursts of aggression makes them behave erratically. They have a developed sixth-sense and the ability to use telekinesis. Their sixth sense allows them to see a possible threat without direct visual contact and establish its position. Telekinesis allows it to manipulate large objects at a distance, hurl them at an enemy, and use pyrokinesis to emit blasts of intense heat at opponents when no objects can be thrown. Their abilities, personalities, and intelligence makes them one of the most dangerous creatures in the Zone.

text.ru: The hands of Burers have obtained a myriad of attributes, most positive of which seems to be the flesh’s extremely high resistance to radiation. Exactly how this is achieved is unknown; it repels gamma rays as if it were made of lead. You can do your part for the scientific community by selling all hands of Burers that you find to scientists for study
text.en: The hands of Burers have obtained a myriad of attributes, most positive of which seems to be the flesh’s extremely high resistance to radiation. Exactly how this is achieved is unknown; it repels gamma rays as if it were made of lead. You can do your part for the scientific community by selling all hands of Burers that you find to scientists for further research.

text.ru: \nUnknown human mutations, results of genetic experimentation, or left-behind people twisted by the Zone’s unstable environment. Supposedly has a hypo trophic limb that enables telepathy. Its face closely resembles that of a normal human being. This creature is very cunning. In most cases, it hides its telepathic limb under a cloak. From afar, it resembles a hunchbacked hermit, sometimes tries deliberately to lure in unsuspecting Stalkers with a request or conversation. As soon as the Stalker turns around, it stands up straight and attacks with its hypotrophic limb. If a Stalker shares some food with this creature, then it might share some very interesting information about the Zone, or tell a story. It eats rats, dogs, fleshes, and sometimes people. It can sometimes follow a solitary Stalker, robbing him while he sleeps.
text.en: The result of a genetic experimentation, or left-behind people twisted by the Zone's unstable environment. Supposedly has a hypotrophic limb that enables telepathy. This creature is very cunning; in most cases, it hides its telepathic limb under a cloak. From afar, it resembles a hunchbacked hermit, and it sometimes deliberately lures unsuspecting stalkers with a request or conversation. As soon as the stalker turns around, it stands up straight and attacks with its hypotrophic limb. If a stalker shares some food with this creature, then it might share some very interesting information about the Zone, or tell a story. It eats rats, dogs, Fleshes, and sometimes people. It can sometimes follow a solitary stalker, robbing him while he sleeps.

text.ru: Izlom is a half mutated creature in the Zone, and it's arm is very strong. There are legends about them, since some of them still can speak, and if you won't kill Izlom, he can tell you stories about his life, and the Zone. Well, if you take his arm, the scientists will pay you a lot, if you can bring them one in good condition!
text.en: Izlom is a half-mutated creature in the Zone, and its arm is very strong. There are legends about them, since some of them still can speak, and if you won't kill Izlom, he can tell you stories about his life, and the Zone. Well, if you take his arm, the scientists will pay you a lot, if you can bring them one in good condition!

text.ru: \nThe Brain Scorcher completely erases the personality of all those unlucky enough to be caught within range of the psi-waves it emits, leaving behind only empty shells of the men who succumb to its effects. Having wandered a bit around the Zone, these bodies that were stripped of their minds turn into the most real of zombies. Only the most primitive reflexes are spared, such as walking, throwing strong blows, and eating. The clothes these zombies carry wear away and become useless over time. As a result, these zombies become veritable half-corpses that are guided only by the most basic of instincts – to eat and sleep. Zombies do not care what they eat or drink, as long as it nourishes their bodies and keeps them "living" for lack of a better word. As a result, their bodies are completely saturated with radiation and toxins. These creatures always wander aimlessly about the Zone or lay themselves down inside buildings, as if corpses. As soon as a zombie senses the presence of a nearby animal or person, it immediately tries to attack and subdue the victim so it can feed. Experienced Stalkers always try to avoid these clumsy corpses, not wanting to waste ammo or risk injury as the zombies take quite a beating before they fall.
text.en: The Brain Scorcher strips its victim of mind and reason, leaving only an empty, mindless shell. The brainless bodies then turn into zombies, following only the most basic instincts, wandering aimlessly around the Zone without weapons or clothing. Zombies are little more than sluggish walking corpses, caring only about food and sleep. They eat and drink just about anything they can get their claws on, hence they are virtually soaked in radiation and toxic waste. Usually they roam the Zone without any apparent purpose or just lie corpse-like in abandoned buildings. However, as soon as they sense the presence of a human being, they attack immediately. Experienced stalkers have learned to avoid them if they can.

text.ru: \nThe only difference these particular zombies have from regular civilian zombies is that the Brain Scorcher not only destroyed the minds of these individuals, but also completely scrambled the molecular structure of their bodies. As a result, these zombies are practically dead, yet they take a lot more punishment before their bodies cannot survive any longer.
text.en: The only difference these particular zombies have from regular civilian zombies is that the Brain Scorcher not only destroyed the minds of these individuals, but also completely scrambled the molecular structure of their bodies. As a result, these zombies are practically dead, yet they take a lot more punishment before their bodies cannot survive any longer.

text.ru: The characteristics of zombie flesh are currently unknown. You can do your part for the scientific community by selling them to scientists for study. Rumors say that the Brain Scorcher affected not only the minds of those caught in it, but also their bodies, to a point. That could explain why zombies and zombified Stalkers shrug off extremely high levels of radiation as if it was nothing.
text.en: The characteristics of zombie flesh are currently unknown. You can do your part for the scientific community by selling them to scientists for study. Rumors say that the Brain Scorcher affected not only the minds of those caught in it, but also their bodies, to a point. That could explain why zombies and zombified stalkers shrug off extremely high levels of radiation as if it was nothing.
Mutated horse species now extinct. They were systematically hunted down by Duty as Freedom used them in the early days of the Zone as cavalry. No more data available.

text.ru: Солдаты регулярных армейских частей. Охраняют подходы к закрытой территории Зоны, патрулируя периметр, расстреливая мутантов и отлавливая мародёров. \nАрмейский спецназ - элитные подразделения. Как правило, высаживаются в Зоне для проведения спасательных и специальных операций.
text.en: Regular army soldiers. They guard all roads into the Zone, patrol its perimeter, kill mutants and hunt down looters. \nSpetsnaz - elite army troops, usually dispatched to the Zone to conduct rescue operations and other special missions.

text.ru: Солдаты, прошедшие после опыта службы в Зоне специальную подготовку, или сталкеры, подписавшие контракт с армией. Обычно снабжаются большим количеством вспомогательной аппаратуры и хорошо вооружены. В основном используются для изучения причин и последствий катастрофы, а также занимаются картографированием Зоны. Могут ходить как поодиночке, так и группами до пяти человек. Обычных сталкеров к себе не подпускают - сразу же открывают огонь.
text.en: Soldiers who underwent special training following their service in the Zone or stalkers who voluntarily signed a contract with the Army. Usually equipped with various support gear and well-armed. Used mainly to study the causes and effects of the catastrophe and to map out the Zone. They can work on their own or in small detachments of up to five people. Military stalkers do not allow normal stalkers to approach and open fire on sight.

text.ru: Мобильная лаборатория выглядит как небольшой металлический бункер с маленькими тонированными окошками. Способна выдержать почти все известные человеку повреждения любого характера. Может быть переведена в полностью автономный режим на несколько месяцев, для чего снабжена надёжными системами жизнеобеспечения. В Зону доставляется грузовым вертолётом. Персонал лаборатории никогда не пускает посторонних далее внешней шлюзовой камеры, поэтому внутрь лаборатории не проникал ни один из сталкеров.
text.en: A mobile lab resembles a small, armored bunker with tiny windows of tainted glass. The lab is capable of withstanding a lot of damage and with its reliable life-support systems it can work autonomously for several months. The bunker is delivered into the Zone by a transport helicopter. The lab staff never allow visitors past the external air-lock chamber, so no stalker has ever been inside one.

text.ru: Представители криминального мира, пришедшие в Зону по разным причинам: заработать на продаже артефактов, скрыться от закона, купить или продать оружие. В Зоне много подобного элемента уровнем от шпаны до серьёзных уголовников. В большинстве своём объединены в банды. Хотя единой бандитской организации в Зоне до сих пор нет, сильно докучают рядовым сталкерам.
text.en: Members of the criminal underworld who came to the Zone for different reasons: to make money by selling artifacts, hide from the law or trade in weapons. The Zone is full of bandits, ranging from common thugs to serious criminals, most of whom are members of one gang or another. Although the Zone gangs frequently fight among themselves, the criminal element still poses a serious problem for normal stalkers.

text.ru: Явно военизированная группировка, отличающаяся строгой дисциплиной: её члены живут фактически по уставу. Только представители "Долга" не торгуют уникальными порождениями Зоны с внешним миром: по слухам, все найденные этими людьми артефакты сдаются учёным. Каждый "долговец" считает своей главной целью защиту мира от воздействия Зоны. Большинство операций группировки связаны с истреблением монстров, поэтому рейды "Долга" нередко избавляют рядовых сталкеров от многих насущных проблем. Давно и яростно враждует с группировкой "Свобода".
text.en: A paramilitary group known for its discipline, whose members live according to a strict code. Duty members are the only group to refuse to trade unique items from the Zone with the outside world. According to rumors, all artifacts found by the group are passed on to scientists. Its members consider protecting the outside world from the Zone's dangers their primary objective. Most of the group's operations concern destroying monsters, hence Duty raids often save normal stalkers from serious trouble. The faction has long been at war with Freedom.

text.ru: Анархисты и сорвиголовы, объявившие себя борцами за свободу на территории Зоны, и поэтому постоянно конфликтующие с армейскими подразделениями, военными сталкерами и группировкой "Долг". "Свободовцы" считают, что информацию о происходящем в Зоне нельзя скрывать от человечества, таким образом оспаривая монополию правительственных организаций на владение здешними тайнами и чудесами.
text.en: Anarchists and daredevils who declare themselves fighters for a free access to the Zone and consequently find themselves in constant conflict with the army, military stalkers and the Duty faction. These so-called freedom warriors believe in sharing all information about the Zone with the rest of the world and challenge the state's monopoly over the Zone's secrets and wonders.

text.ru: Самая загадочная и скрытная группировка в Зоне, в сущестование которой многие даже не верят. Кое-кто постоянно пользуется услугами наёмников: профессионалы в своей области, они быстро расправятся с любым сталкером и даже могут полностью ликвидировать небольшую группировку. За свои услуги, судя по всему, берут немалые суммы в деньгах или артефактах. Расположение базы данной группировки до сих пор остаётся загадкой; очевидно, она находится где-то в глубине Зоны.
text.en: The most clandestine and secretive faction in the Zone; some don't even believe in its existence. There are those who regularly use the Mercs' services as they are true pros, able to quickly deal with any stalker and even annihilate a small group of opponents. Their services do not come cheap - the Mercs demand a king's ransom for their services in money or artifacts. The location of their base remains a secret, suggesting that it is deep inside the Zone.

text.ru: Сталкеры, исследующие Зону в одиночку. Таких большинство, поскольку членство в группировке отбирает драгоценное время, тем самым уменьшая зароботок; кроме того, некоторые просто по натуре своей склонны к одиночеству и независимости.
text.en: Stalkers exploring the Zone on their own. Most stalkers work this way since being a member of a group takes precious time, and part of the loot. Then there are some who simply prefer solitude and independence.

text.ru: Группировка, скорее напоминающая религиозную секту. Её члены верят, что в центре Зоны покоится эволюционный кристалл - Монолит - неземного происхождения. Большинство сталкеров презирают адептов Монолита, считая их помешанными. Со времени своего образования группа препятствует продвижению сталкеров к центру Зоны, мотивируя это недобрыми намерениями последних в отношении Монолита. По слухам, у "монолитовцев" есть крупная база где-то ближе к центру Зоны, но точного её расположения не знает никто, кроме самих членов группировки.
text.en: This group displays many features of a religious sect. Its members believe in the existence of a complex alien crystal, the Monolith, located somewhere in the center of the Zone. Most stalkers treat Monolith adepts with contempt and consider them as lunatics. From its inception the group strives to block all progress towards the center of the Zone, protecting the Monolith from other stalkers. Rumor has it that the group has a large base deep in the Zone, but its exact location is know only to the members.

text.ru: Те, кто подвергся длительному воздействию излучателей на "Янтаре" или некоторых других секторах. Неосторожные сталкеры быстро сходят с ума, превращаясь в бродячие полутрупы. Их много бродит по Зоне, некоторые добираются даже до периметра. Так или иначе, помочь им уже невозможно: процесс разрушения личности необратим. Хотя зомбированные сталкеры ещё могут воспользоваться своим оружием, они довольно глупы. При встрече можно услышать, как они бубнят себе под нос обрывки фраз, - которые, впрочем, начисто лишены смысла. Со временем зомбированные сталкеры окончательно утрачивают все прежние навыки и превращаются в зомби. Как правило, они очень агрессивны и при значительном скоплении представляют серьёзную угрозу.
text.en: Poor souls subjected to prolonged exposure in Yantar and a few other heavily radiated sectors. Careless stalkers gone mad and turned into walking corpses. Many such corpses wander the Zone, some wander as far as the perimeter. They are beyond help because the destructive process is irreversible. Zombified stalkers are still able to use their weapons, but they are quite dumb and can be heard mumbling meaningless, fragmented sentences to themselves. They gradually lose all their skills and turn into zombies. They are usually very aggressive and can present a serious threat in large numbers.

text.ru:
Оригинальное ружье БМ16. Тяжелое и опасное ружье, эффективно на больших дистанциях.
 Боеприпасы:
 12х70 дробь,
 12x76 жекан,
 12x76 дротик.
text.en:
The original Bm16 rifle. Heavy and dangerous two barrel rifle, and its effective in high range too.
 Ammunition:
 12x70 buckshot
 12x76 slug
 12x76 dart

text.ru: .44 Магнум - это удлиненная версия .44 Special case, увеличена скорость полета пули (и, следовательно, мощность).\nНо .44 Магнум по характеристикам оказался хуже .454 Casull, оружия властей;\nтем не менее, он остается одним из самых популярных крупнопалиберных стволов.
text.en: The .44 Magnum is based on a lengthened .44 Special case, loaded to higher pressures for greater velocity (and thus, energy).\nThe .44 Magnum has since been eclipsed in power by the .454 Casull, among others;\nnevertheless, it has remained one of the most popular commercial large-bore magnum cartridges.

text.ru: Эти патроны длиннее патронов .44 Special case, при выстреле вылетают с большим давлением и, следовательно, большей скоростью.
text.en: A lengthened .44 Special case, loaded to higher pressures for greater velocity.

text.ru: Зажигательные боеприпасы имеют материал из соединения бария и алюминия в передней части патрона. Когда патрон поражает относительно твердый объект, он взрывается с яркой вспышкой при температуре примерно 3000 градусов по Фаренгейту, чтобы зажечь горючий материал. Следует соблюдать осторожность при стрельбе этими патронами, чтобы не допускать возникновение лесных пожаров.
text.en: Incendiary ammunition is loaded with a Barium and Aluminium compound in the forward portion of the projectile. When the projectile strikes a relatively solid object, it detonates with a bright flash at approximately 3000 degress fahrenheit to ignite combustible material. Caution must be exercised when firing these rounds as to prevent accidental brush fires.

text.ru: Базовый патрон для пистолетов Colt 1911 и Sig 220. Простой сердечник, оболочечная пуля.
text.en: A standard round for the Kora-919 and the SIP-t M200 pistols. It has a standard core and a full-jacketed bullet.

text.ru: Так называемый "Гидрошок" - патрон с улучшенными характеристиками для пистолетов Colt 1911 и Sig 220. Экспансивная пуля, обладающая хорошим останавливающим действием.
text.en: An Hydro-Shock round with improved characteristics for the Kora-919 and the SIP-t M200 pistols. It has a hollow-point bullet with a good stopping effect.

text.ru: Обычный патрон 12-го калибра, снаряжённый 6-мм дробью. На близких дистанциях обладает огромным убойным действием. Предназначен для дробовиков ТОЗ-34, БМ-12, Winchester 1300, SPAS 12. Наиболее эффективен на дальностях до 30 метров.
text.en: A standard 12 calibre round filled with 6 mm shot. It has an enormous killing power at a close range. It is designed for the BM 17, the Chaser 13 and the SPSA14 shotguns. It is most effective at ranges under 30 meters.

text.ru: Оперённая пуля, стабилизирующаяся в полёте, что положительно сказывается на точности. Для дробовиков ТОЗ-34, БМ-12, Winchester 1300, SPAS 12. Увеличенные дальность и бронебойность - эффективен на дальностях до 150 метров.
text.en: A finned bullet. It can stabilize in flight, which increases its accuracy. It is designed for the TOS 34, the BM 17, Chaser 13 and the SPSA14 shotguns. It has an armor-piercing effect and an increased range. It is effective at a range of up to 150 meters.

text.ru: Патрон с тяжёлой безоболочечной пулей. Обычно используется для охоты на крупных животных, но подходит и для других целей. Его тяжёлая пуля не пробивает, а фактически продавливает бронежилеты. Предназначен для дробовиков ТОЗ-34, БМ-12, Winchester 1300, SPAS 12. Эффективен на дальностях до 100 метров.
text.en: A round with a heavy naked bullet. It is usually used for big game hunting, but can be used for other purposes. Its heavy bullet does not pierce but actually forces itself through bulletproof vests. It is designed for the TOS 34, the BM 17, the Chaser 13 and the SPSA14 shotguns. It is effective at a range of up to 100 meters.

text.ru: Бронебойный патрон для автоматов AКС-74, АКС-74У, AH-94. Улучшенная бронебойная способность пули.
text.en: An armor-piercing round for the Akm 74/2, the Akm 74/2U and the ON-94 assault rifles. It has an improved armor-piercing effect, but a decreased stopping effect.

text.ru: Стандартный патрон для автоматов АКС-74, АКС-74У, AH-94. Простой сердечник, оболочечная пуля.
text.en: A standard round for the Akm 74/2, the Akm 74/2U and the Obokan assault rifles. It has a standard core and a full-jacketed bullet.

text.ru: Патрон с бронебойной пулей для штурмовых винтовок L85, LR300, Sig550, G36, FN2000.
text.en: A round with an armor-piercing bullet for the IL 86, the TRs 301, the SGI 5k, the GP 37 and the FT 200M assault rifles.

text.ru: Стандартный натовский патрон, широко известный под бельгийским индексом SS109. Используется в штурмовых винтовках L85, LR300, Sig550, G36, FN2000.
text.en: A standard NATO round widely-known under its Belgian SS109 index. It is used with the IL 86, the TRs 301, the SGI 5k, the GP 37 and the FT 200M assault rifles.

text.ru: Дешёвая в изготовлении модификация снайперского патрона для снайперских винтовок СВД, СВУ-АС.
text.en: A cheap modification of the sniper round for the SVDm 2, SVUmk2 sniper rifles.

text.ru: Снайперский патрон для снайперских винтовок СВД, СВУ-АС и пулемёта ПКМ. Обладает улучшенными характеристиками по точности и дальности.
text.en: A sniper round for the SVDm 2 and the SVUmk2 sniper rifles. It has an improved accuracy and range.

text.ru: Патрон с бронебойной пулей. Для снайперских винтовок СВД, СВУ-АС.
text.en: A round with an armor-piercing bullet for the SVDm 2 and the SVUmk2 sniper rifles.

text.ru: Базовый патрон для пистолетов ПМ, ПБ, "Форт-12". Простой сердечник, оболочечная пуля. Слабое бронебойное действие.
text.en: A standard round for the PMm, PB1s, Fort-12Mk2 pistols. It has a standard core and a full-jacketed bullet. It has a weak armor-piercing effect.

text.ru: Патрон с улучшенными баллистическими характеристиками для пистолетов ПМ, ПБ, Форт-12. За счёт более высокой начальной скорости пули намного эффективнее обычного патрона. Более выраженный бронебойный эффект.
text.en: A round with improved ballistic characteristics for the PMm, the PB1s and the Fort-12Mk2 pistols. Due to the high initial velocity of its bullet, it is much more effective then a standard round. It has a better armor-piercing effect.

text.ru: Патроны с мягкой оболочкой, пуля при попадании в поверхность лишь слегка деформируется, что позволяет ей на некоторое время быть бронебойной.
text.en: A round with a Jacketed Soft Point rather than expanding on impact, the bullet deforms slightly, allowing for a limited armor piercing effect.

text.ru: Базовый патрон для пистолета Walther P99 и пистолета-пулемета HK MP5. Оболочечная пуля. Слабое бронебойное действие.
text.en: A standard round for the Walker P9m pistol and the Viper 5 submachine gun. It has a full-jacketed bullet with a weak armor-piercing effect.

text.ru: Патрон с улучшенными характеристиками для пистолета Walther P99 и пистолета-пулемета HK MP5. Мощный патрон с экспансивной пулей и бронебойным сердечником.
text.en: An improved round for the Walker P9m and the Viper 5 submachine gun. A high-powered round with a hollow-point bullet and an armor-piercing core.

text.ru: Бронебойный патрон для автоматов "Гроза", "Вал" и специальной снайперской винтовки "Винторез". Имеет дозвуковую скорость полёта, но за счёт пули особой конструкции пробивает большинство бронежилетов на дальностях до 400 метров.
text.en: An armor-piercing round for the Tunder S14 and the VLA assault rifles and for the Vintar special sniper rifle. It has a subsonic bullet which due to its special design can penetrate most bulletproof vests at a range of up to 400 meters.

text.ru: Патрон для автоматов "Гроза", "Вал" и специальной снайперской винтовки "Винторез". Более поздняя и дешёвая в изготовлении модификация бронебойного патрона. Имеет дозвуковую скорость полёта, но за счёт пули особой конструкции пробивает большинство бронежилетов на дальностях до 300 метров.
text.en: A round for the Tunder S14 and the VLA assault rifles and the Vintar special sniper rifle. The later and cheaper modification of the armor-piercing round. It has a subsonic bullet which due to its special design can penetrate most bulletproof vests at a range of up to 300 meters.

text.ru: Снайперский патрон для автоматов "Гроза", "Вал" и специальной снайперской винтовки "Винторез". Имеет дозвуковую скорость полета, но за счёт тяжёлой пули особой конструкции пробивает большинство бронежилетов на дальностях до 400 метров.
text.en: A sniper round for the Tunder S14 and the VLA assault rifles and the Vintar special sniper rifle. It has a subsonic bullet which due to its heavy weight and special design can penetrate most bulletproof vests at a range of up to 400 meters.

text.ru: Энергетические ёмкости с готовыми убойными элементами в магазине для гаусс-винтовки. Источником энергии является капсулированный фрагмент артефакта "Вспышка".
text.en: Energy cells prepared with lethal elements in a Gauss rifle magazine. The energy source is an encapsulated piece of the Flash artifact.

text.ru: Граната для подствольного гранатомета М203 (винтовки LR-300, Sig550) и для интегрированного гранатомета в FN2000.
text.en: A grenade for the ?203 grenade launcher (for the TRs 301, GP 37, SGI 5k, IL 86 rifles) and the integrated grenade launcher of the FT 200M.

text.ru: Осколочно-фугасная граната для РПГ-7В. Одинаково эффективна как против живой силы, так и против легкобронированой техники.
text.en: A highly-explosive grenade for the RPG-7u. It is equally effective against troops and light armored vehicles.

text.ru: Стандартная граната для подствольного гранатомета ГП-25 "Костёр", интегрированного подствольника у "Грозы" и револьверного гранатомета РГ-6.
text.en: A grenade for the GP-25 Kostyer grenade launcher, the integrated grenade launcher of the Tunder, and the Bulldog 6 revolver grenade launcher.

text.ru: Граната для подствольного гранатомета ГП-25 "Костёр", интегрированного подствольника у "Грозы" и револьверного гранатомета РГ-6. Перед взрывом граната подпрыгивает на высоту около метра, что увеличивает её поражающее действие.
text.en: A grenade for the GP-25 Kostyer grenade launcher, the integrated grenade launcher of the Tunder S14 and the Bulldog 6 revolver grenade launcher. Prior explosion the grenade leaps up about one meter increasing its killing effect.

text.ru: Ручная оборонительная граната с большим радиусом поражения осколками. Бросать рекомендуется только из укрытия.
text.en: A defensive hand grenade with a large radius of splinter damage. It is recommended to throw it only from behind cover.

text.ru: Ручная дымовая граната. Предназначена для установки дымового прикрытия. Время действия - 10 секунд.
text.en: A smoke grenade. Dedicated to create a smoke screen. Lasts for 10 seconds.

text.ru: Наступательная ручная граната с небольшим радиусом поражения осколками.
text.en: An offensive hand grenade with a small radius of splinter damage.

text.ru:
Образец 1994 года на базе системы Калашникова. Был разработан в качестве замены устаревшему AK-74. В "Абакане" подвижны не только внутренние механизмы, но и вся ствольная коробка вместе со стволом, что позволяет снизить отдачу, тем самым значительно повысив точность боя.
 Боеприпасы:
 обычный 5,45x39 мм,
 бронебойный 5,45x39 мм БП.
text.en:
The weapon of the elite troops in the Russian army. It was designed as a replacement for the outdated Akm 74/2. Not only the Obokan’s internal mechanisms but also its receiver and its barrel are movable, which decreases the recoil and increases accuracy.
 Ammunition:
 standard 5.45x39 mm,
 armor-piercing 5.45x39 mm BP.

text.ru: Автомат, снабженный модифицированным оптическим прицелом для ведения снайперского огня. Вмонтированная в корпус оптика обладает большей кратностью, чем стандартные прицелы.
text.en: Machine gun supplied with a modified optic sight for carrying out sniper fire. The optics embedded into the body of the weapon has a higher resolution than the standard model.

text.ru: Данный автомат снабжен интегрированным подствольным гранатометом, что делает эту модель еще более универсальным оружием.
text.en: Given machine gun has an integral granade launcher to go under the barrel, which makes this an even more universal weapon.

text.ru: Подствольный гранатомет для автоматов, используемых в странах Варшавского договора. \n Боеприпасы - граната ВОГ-25\n и граната ВОГ-25P.
text.en: A grenade launcher for the Akm 74/2 and Akm 74/2U.\n Ammunition: VOG-25 grenade,\n and VOG-25R grenade.

text.ru: Подствольный гранатомет для винтовок NATO.\n Боеприпасы - гранаты M209.
text.en: A grenade launcher for the SGI 5k, the TRs 301, the GP 37 and the IL 86.\n Ammunition: M209 grenades.

text.ru: Широко распространённый оптический прицел советского производства. Для установки на оружие используется стандартное в странах Варшавского договора крепление типа "ласточкин хвост".
